titlestmt.titleproper: Indiana University Department of Spanish and Portuguese records, 1963-2005 C612

did.unittitle: Indiana University Department of Spanish and Portuguese records

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Indiana University, Bloomington. Department of Spanish and Portuguese.

did.abstract: The Indiana University Department of Spanish and Portuguese offers courses and degrees in both Spanish and Portuguese for graduate and undergraduate students. This collection covers a variety of administrative records including minutes, department reviews and plans, faculty information, department event information, and the visit of Ernesto Cardenal.
did.langmaterial: Materials are in English, Spanish, and Portuguese.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for research. Advance notice required.

bioghist.head: Administrative History
bioghist.p: Spanish was originally offered as a course through the Department of Romance Languages along with French and Italian. Beginning in 1935 Spanish became its own department within the College of Arts and Sciences and courses were offered for both graduate and undergraduate study. In 1952, the Department of Spanish expanded and became the Department of Spanish and Portuguese. Today, the Department offers both introductory and advanced courses in Spanish and Portuguese languages as well as courses focusing on literature, linguistics, culture, and grammar.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The Collection is comprised of one Administrative series of records.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Organized into a single series of Administrative records, this collection covers a wide range of activities performed by the Department of Spanish and Portuguese. A large chunk of the small collection consists of faculty meeting minutes spanning 1963-1982 but also includes information on other departmental happenings such as special events and lectures, including that of Ernesto Cardenal in 1992. The Frances Wyer files consist of materials that made up her faculty files within the department and includes correspondence, CVs, and faculty annual reports. It is not clear why this is the only faculty file represented in the collection and it is assumed the others are still with the department.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional records such as newsletters, annual reports, bulletins, and publications may be accessed in the Archives of Institutional Memory.
Archived web sites for this Department may be included in Archive-It.
Related photographs may be available in the University Archives Photographs Database.

userestrict.head: Usage Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyrights for records originating with Indiana University administrative units, departments, and other offices are held by the Trustees of Indiana University. For more information, please contact the Indiana University Archives staff.

The Indiana University Archives respects the intellectual property rights of others and does not claim any copyrights for non-university records, materials in the public domain, or materials for which we do not hold a Deed of Gift. Responsibility for the determination of the copyright status of these materials rests with those persons wishing to reuse the materials. Researchers are responsible for securing permission from copyright owners and any other rights holders for any reuse of these materials that extends beyond fair use or other statutory limitations.

Digital reproductions of archival materials from the Indiana University Archives are made available for noncommercial educational and research purposes only. If you are the copyright holder for any of the digitized materials and have questions about its inclusion on our site, please contact the Indiana University Archivist.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item], Indiana University Department of Spanish and Portuguese records, Collection C612, Indiana University Archives, Bloomington.
